However, during times when he shows his cool and adult side, Mamoru's heart also flutters. One day, when Mamoru stayed over at Nariyuki's house, both of of them shared a passionate desire on the bed?! Nariyuki, who woke up from his sleep, kissed Mamoru and then did XXX?!

title: Libido In The Beaker
synopsis:
Collection of short stories dealing with sex and the slightly strange.

1. Go with the Accident Flow! In the bathroom Sho limbers up his wrist with his mother's panties. Mother comes home early in the soaking rain and can't wait for a nice hot bath. But when she surprises her dear boy he throws the panties in her face. She slips on the wet floor and skids right into--and onto--her son!

2. Double-Dealer Rule Book. Nami wants Ken. Misa wants Ken. They both want Ken to decide who HE wants. But kind-hearted Ken only wants to sooth their hurt feelings and make them happy...

3. Club Activities. Chiaki-sensei discovers a secret host-club for school teachers who meet once a month--and the hosts are students! She awakens from a drugged drink to find she's the club's main event for the night!

4. Libido in the Beaker. Masashi is tasked to donate sperm to get his step-mother pregnant. It seems a cold process with a beaker and a bulb syringe. But as his step-mother sleeps off the anesthesia Msaski wonders what it would be like to really get her pregnant...

5. Occupied. For Satorou and Haruna anywhere, anytime is just fine. If they could just find a place in their school that's not already occupied! Finally there's only one place left...

6. Ice World Get ready for a little weirdness... Touji works a frozen-food warehouse where's it's -30 degrees. He rescued a melting snow-witch and now she lives there in comfort for the summer. But neither of them expected love to happen--and snow witches are insatiable...

7. Peculiar Possession. Her boyfriend just got a great apartment for dirt-cheap. Too good to be true? It's haunted! And this ghost died a virgin and won't depart until she gets laid...

8. The Two-Timer. OK, think fast: Your girlfirend spotted you sneaking into a storeroom with another girl. And right now she's got you by the family jewels and wants an explanation. So you tell her she's your only love and then distract her with sex. LOTS of sex...

9. Taboo Word. Tomoko is furious. That geeky neighbor boy called her oba-san. And she was once known as the "Cos-play Queen." To prove it she dresses up in one of her old costumes, just as the neighbor boy delivers some persimmons to her...

10. Public Bath Saga. Miki always uses the public bathhouse when it's closing. Not only to enjoy the quiet, but also to flirt with bathhouse attendant Daiki. But even when they bathe together he doesn't seem to react. How can she get a rise out of him?

synopsis:
A retro-modern romantic fantasy set in the age of the Kotogami!

After a fearsome beast burns down her company lodgings, Akari finds herself homeless and out of a job. Luckily, the handsome yokai who rescued her from the beast offers her a job as a live-in custodian at a manor in the city. Needing a safe place to sleep, Akari accepts Tomohito’s offer but soon finds that living in a house full of eccentric Kotogami spirits isn’t exactly the sweet deal she was hoping for. With no alternative, Akari resigns herself to cohabiting with her idiosyncratic new roommates.

And so begins the heartwarming tale of the trials, new friendships, and blossoming romance of a hard working young woman, living in an age where the Kotogami spirits walk among humans.

synopsis:
The adventure begins with a school girl named Eri getting magically summoned to a magical world.  Eri has been summoned by a magician named Rex, intent on doing some scientific research observing people from different worlds. Rex is cute, with long dark hair and a rather pained expression at the trials Eri puts him through. Eri is not your average school girl. Instead of being terrified about her current situation, she manages to secure Rex’s promise to summon her again every week. Well OK, so the promise was rather reluctantly given due to a sneaky trick Eri plays involving the alarm on her digital watch. After all, being in a magical world is a lot more exciting than life as a school girl. The manga series chronicles Eri’s adventures in this magical world, as she travels around with Rex and the Prince of that world, a rather bishounen blond named Krueger. Unfortunately for Rex and Krueger, it is somewhat difficult to keep up with the very pushy Eri, and she manages to get them into quite a bit of mischief.

Why did he ever have to fall in love with a guy like Taichiro!? Mr. Super-Aggressive continues to be shaken up by his super airhead pal from childhood.

Handsome Tetsuji Aoi, fawned on by all the ladies, is the charismatic owner of an illegal casino. His only weakness is Taichiro, a guy he grew up with. He doesn't mind it, though, because his bright, cheerful, and unpredictable friend is the love of his life.

One day, Taichiro comes to Tetsuji and suddenly declares that he'll be his mistress! Tetsuji starts touching innocent Taichiro's body hoping to scare him off, but the person he has forever had a crush on begins to get irresistibly aroused, and he doesn't know if he'll be able to keep his cool...

(Source: Renta!)

title: Maou 2099
synopsis:
The cyberpunk metropolis Shinjuku—a massive city-state bedecked with neon signs, towering skyscrapers, and the latest cutting-edge technology. It is here, in year 2099 of the Fused Era, where the legendary Demon Lord Veltol has his second coming five centuries in the making. But this landscape is nothing like the one he conquered all those years ago, for the fusion of magic and engineering has elevated civilization to dazzling, unprecedented heights. Veltol may have been reduced to a historical footnote, but make no mistake...this brave new world will be his for the taking!

(Source: Yen Press)

title: Saiyaku ni Shite Madowazu

synonyms: Even If This Relation Is the Disaster, Not Puzzled
alternative_titles.en: Unfazed by the Disaster in My Life

synopsis:
Masato works as a chef at a local restaurant. During one of his breaks, he had a chance encounter with one of his schoolmates, Mitsukuni, who accidentally spills coffee on his lap. In a rush, Mitsukuni immediately leaves, passively giving Masato a cleaning fee and an irritable temper. Worse, Masato's wallet gets in Mitsukuni's briefcase, which had all of his money and keys. As fate would have it, the two meet again later on at the restaurant Masato works at. While Masato perfectly remembers Mitsukuni during their high school days, Mitsukuni barely remembers the former. When Masato's home ends up catching fire, Mitsukuni is nagged by Masato's co-workers to take him in. Now that the two are living together, certain things come to light and unfold between them.

(Source: Fantasista Inc.)

title: KANOJO GA FUZAI NO AIDA, KANOJO NO SHINYUU TO SHIROKUJICHUU NAKADASHI SHIMATTA

alternative_titles.en: I Spent the Whole Time Fucking My Girlfriend's Friend While She Went on a Trip
alternative_titles.ja: 彼女が不在の間、彼女の親友と四六時中中出ししまった。

synopsis:
Would things have been different if she confessed first? When her friend Yuuka goes on a trip and leaves her boyfriend, Hideyuki, behind, Ayaka takes the opportunity to show him how she feels...
(Source: Irodori Comics)

title: Stateless: Sonzai Nakimono-tachi

alternative_titles.ja: ステイトレスー存在なき者たちー

synopsis:
Haru is a high schooler that has lived his life hated by others for being stateless—someone without a legal nationality. After killing his parents to protect his sister, he gets drawn into the underworld...

(Source: Akita Shoten, translated)

title: GOHOUBI WA TEST NO ATO NI

alternative_titles.ja: ごほうびはテストのあとに

synopsis: Saori's feelings for Kei grows as time passes, but she just doesn't have the courage to confess. Playing it off as a joke, she asks Kei if he would go out with her if she scores more than 90 points on all of her subjects. Kei agrees. (Source: Irodori Comics)

title: Love All Play
synopsis:
Ryou Mizushima enrolls in junior high and joins the badminton club with great vigor. Although the club didn't have a proper coach, Mizushima improved his skills with his own physical strength by the time he participated in the prefectural tournament. Afterwards, he is approached by the Yokohama Minato High School's badminton coach, Ebihara.

Indecisive and timid, Mizushima hesitates to attend such a prestigious school. However, with his elder sister Rika giving him a strong push, he decides to go to Yokohama Minato. Now blessed with a coach and idiosyncratic teammates, Mizushima will gain experience he's lacked till now, and aims to win the inter-high tournament.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Waga Futoku no Itasu Tokoro desu

alternative_titles.en: It Is Due to My Immorality.
alternative_titles.ja: 我が不徳の致すところです
令和雄王 相田宗二
インホワイトピュアストーリー

title: Josou shite Off-kai ni Sanka shitemita.

synonyms: I (♂) Crossed-Dressed for the IRL (♀) Meetup
alternative_titles.en: I Cross-Dressed for the IRL Meetup
alternative_titles.ja: 女装してオフ会に参加してみた。

synopsis:
"Cocoa" has made three best friends in her online game, and she's excited to meet them in real life at a dessert café for the first time. The only problem: She's actually a man who's been lying to them. What begins as a tense manga about online life quickly turns into a lighthearted comedy about friendship, gender, and forgiving yourself and others.

(Source: Kodansha USA)

title: Bessekai no Kirakira Douki ga Ecchi na Illustration wo Kaite iru

alternative_titles.ja: 別世界のキラキラ同期がエッチなイラストを描いている

synopsis:
Kagaishi, who was transferred to an unfamiliar sales position after only six months in the company, is struggling to do his job well. The one person who is always kind to him is his classmate in the sales department, Hiyo. She is the complete opposite of Kageki-kun, a sparkling girl who is beautiful, a strong communicator, and good at her job. However, like a resident of another world, Hiyou-san has an unbelievable hobby that she can't tell anyone about... This is a synchronized love comedy with a disparity in attributes from saku of "I'm troubled by my wife who has too strong a sexual desire"

Source:https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/3z2bcpz/bessekai-no-kirakira-douki-ga-ecchi-na-illustration-wo-kaite-iru

title: Beast and Harrian
synopsis:
A collection of 3 stories:

1) The Beast and Harrian
The Beauty and the Beast with the manhwaga's own twist.

2) Across
Psychological and slightly supernatural pairing of an angsty couple.

3) Soft
A story revolving around roommate drama.

title: 3-Second Strip
synopsis:
Just spend three seconds of your day on this three-panel comic!

(Source: LINE Webtoon)

title: Kattobi Edozakura!!
synopsis:
Adapted version of Japan's historical event during the Bakufu Era, Princess Kasu no Miya had to marriage Shogun Iemochi for political reason. Before the marriage ceremony, she wants to meet a boy she met when she was little once for one more time. Princess Kasu no Miya runs away from her guards and meets Ishinosuke and Sakon who opens their detective business on the street.

Without telling them who she is at first, she hires the two to fend off her guards and later after her truth identity revealed, she continues asking them to help her find her first love. With time running out, will Sakon and Ishinosuke be able to find that man? Who is that boy Miya fell in love with back there?

title: Sensei Datte Otoshigoro
synopsis:
This is the story of a 20-year-old girl named Itano Kayo. She is in the process of making her dream of becoming a teacher come true. She is very nervous and excited. Kayo is a small and cute girl. She looks more like a student than a teacher. She has dreamed of being a teacher ever since she was a small child. Since the moment when a teacher saved her when she was being bullied by some boys in her class, she has wanted to be a good teacher like that and to help kids.

All this enthusiasm may be great, but the true is that when it comes to facing actual students, things get off to a bumpy start. On her way to her classroom, she spots a guy sneaking out of the infirmary window. Thinking that he is trying to cut class, she goes to confront him about his behavior, but her nerves show up, and she doesn’t sound as confident as she should. And wow, the student is really handsome and he doesn’t seem intimidated by Kayo’s authority at all. what will happen with this encounter...

(Source: Niko-Niko.net)

title: BL Ero Mangaka to Shoujo Mangaka to Horror Mangaka no Tadareta Nichijou

alternative_titles.ja: BLエロ漫画家と少女漫画家とホラー漫画家のただれた日常

title: Yuubae Sakusen
synopsis:
One day during class, high schooler Suzuka Shigeru got a text message from his classmate, Kazama Akio. The text message read "I have something interesting to show you." Having no idea what he wanted to show him, Shigeru visits the Kazama residence.

The Kazama residence is huge and looks to have a lot of history behind it. Akio takes Shigeru to a cluster of three "Torii" (Japanese Shinto gates) in the huge backyard of his mansion. At sunset...when the shadows of the three gates merge, a shining beacon of light forms at the cross section. Out of curiosity behind this mysterious phenomenon, Akio pushes Shigeru and himself through the beacon of light. Next thing they know, they end up in the Edo period of warring Japan, in between the battle between the Iga and Kazama Ninja clans...!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Royal Marriage
synopsis:
As the beloved daughter of a viscountess and the fiancée of a duke, Tatiana Cartienne was the belle of high society. But when she refuses to marry after discovering the duke's infidelity, she begins to see that she was simply a pawn in her family's power play. In her attempt to break free, she turns to Kynell Townsend, a war hero who was once humiliated by the viscountess for his attempt to woo Tatiana. With title and fortune out of the picture, will they be able to reset their love story?

(Source: Tapas Media)

alternative_titles.ja: ビッグマグナム黒岩先生

title: Blossom
synopsis:
Grown-ups have always told Yu-Fan that a girl should act like a girl: learn the piano; be quiet and dignified rather than noisy and rough; and wear skirts. Under pressure from her mother and grandmother, Yu-Fan has no choice but to hide who she really is and dress up as the girl they want her to be. 

Source: Anilist

4. Ijippari☆Person

title: Kami Maneki no Niwa
synopsis:
The Saitei (rear shrine) of Kabutozaka Province is a place to invite and entertain the gods. Gods with substance invite fertility and prosperity, but on the other hand, if they get violent, they bring terrible disasters to the country. Ayame, the daughter of a local count, went to Tokyo to find out the truth behind her best friend's death. There, Ayame, who accidentally calmed down the raging goddess, was appointed as a lady of the courtyard by her younger brother, Niran. However, that was just the beginning of an incident that would shake the country's existence...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Saboten-kun
synopsis:
Cactus Sam is just your regular, ordinary cowboy, but give him just a sip of milk and transforms from a calm, congenial fellow, into the rootin-est, tootin-est, two-gun shootin-est cowpoke you ever did see... And it just so happens his parents own the local "Milk-Hall." Join "Cactus" on his adventures, as he makes some new friends and battles unsavory characters across the Old West - with his trusty six-shooter in one hand, and a nice, ice-cold cold, glass of milk in the other.

(Source: DMG)

title: Katsuko Otsukaeshimasu!
synopsis:
Katsuko, the daughter of butler that serve Ootori family since long ago, now have to deal with the heir of Ootori family and also the principal of High school that katsuko attends. Her life becoming more and more busy than usual because she have to serve the eccentric young master plus attend to High School as a normal student.

(Source: MU)

title: Godland Company

alternative_titles.ja: GODLAND COMPANY ゴッドランド・カンパニー

synopsis:
A strange bunch of supernatural beings have moved in next door to Hanazawa Meoto. They call themselves "Godland Company," and they're gods/spirits/demons who perform odd jobs to help other supernatural beings like themselves when they get into any trouble with humans. There's little Kuroto the Karasu Tengu, Mia Blutheim the vampire, Neruru Hearteater the succubus, Shadric Kagel the shadow earl, and the mysterious Haizono. How will Meoto react to her new neighbours?

(Source: saladesu)

title: Magic Maker: Isekai Mahou no Tsukurikata

alternative_titles.en: Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World
alternative_titles.ja: マジック・メイカー －異世界魔法の作り方－

synopsis:
A man who was thirty years old and wanted to use magic died unexpectedly, and when he woke up, he was reborn in another world. Named Theon, he had high hopes that there would be magic in another world, but there was no magic in that world.

Theon became depressed and lethargic, but an event led him to discover the existence of magic.

"That's right. If there is no magic, then I will make it myself."

With this in mind, Theon began researching magic from that day onwards. Eventually, through the spread of a disease that can only be cured by magic, and a chance encounter with an enemy that can only be defeated by magic, Theon becomes a hero who saves the world. This is the story of a simple magic fool who, while tossed about by fate, overcomes it with the power of magic and an indomitable fighting spirit, ultimately propagating magic to the people.

(Source: Shousetsuka ni Narou, translated)

title: PIEN - kīro no satsujin
synopsis:
Kazuma Nanashima, a college student, returns to his apartment where he lives alone after finishing practice for the drama club.. A scream is heard from the next room.. When I opened the door of the next room fearfully, there was a bloody "Pien" man standing there..

(source: Ganma!)

title: My Precious Little Villains
synopsis:
I don't know how it happened, but I was reborn into a novel as Hannah, the caregiver and teacher at the temple's orphanage. To make matters worse, the children I care for—Mika, Jeremy, and Ian—will become my murderers and the villains of this novel. In order to survive, I attempted to escape, but these cute little rascals couldn't bear to see me leave. Since they are still young, maybe I can raise them to become good people instead of bad ones. How hard could it be to raise a few villains?

(Source: Tapas Media)

Hatsukoi Body
synopsis:
Fourth year elementary student Kotone is obsessed with the aesthetic appreciation of muscles, and her older neighbor Jouji is her ideal body type. But lately, Jouji has been so down his pectoralis major hasn't even been tense. What's a girl to do?

(Source: Antisense Scanslations)

title: Sekai no Owari to Guruguru Bambi

alternative_titles.ja: 世界の終わりとぐるぐるバンビ

synopsis:
Riko Sawara is overjoyed when she learns she passed her high school entrance exam. However, she is hit by a truck on his way home, and she comes to the realization that she doesn't know love yet! She survives by a hair and enrolls in high school, where she meets Usami. Riko is strangely drawn to Usami, only to find out he has a secret…

(Source: Tokyo Otaku Mode, edited)

title: Hizumi no Dual
synopsis:
Despite the danger, Kaname runs to his friend Takechiyo's house when he saw it on fire. Instead of his friend, the one he encountered was a cat demon.

The next day, Kaname sees Takechiyo again, alive and unharmed… but his friend has become a different person. Kaname finds out the truth when he encounters the cat demon again…

(Source: MU)

title: Wagahai no Heya de Aru
synopsis:
The manga centers on 23-year-old graduate student Tetsurou, who lives alone in his apartment in Tokyo. His apartment is in a 41-year-old, two-story building that is five minutes away from the nearest train station by foot. The series focuses Tetsurou his daily life, as he monologues about such topics as the report that is nearing its deadline, his bitterness in making a mistake at his part-time job, agonizing whether or not he'll ask out the girl he likes, or bantering with his friends via text. Tetsurou is the only character that appears, and his room is the only setting, but sometimes his furniture or electronics will quip during his monologues.

(Source: ANN)

Included one-shot:
Volume 6: Tashikame ni Ikou

alternative_titles.ja: ディエンビエンフー True End

title: Hanameguri Awase
synopsis:
A story which takes place in the Meiji Era. Hozumi Kyou, a poor 13-year-old countryside girl, is leaving her town and going to Tokyo to go to apprenticeship. Kyou is determined to earn a lot of money so that she can buy medicine in to heal her mother's blindness.She gets lost in Tokyo where soon she meets a young man who could help her with her apprenticeship-? But there are some hurdles in the way-?

(Source: Phoenix Serenade)

alternative_titles.ja: 握ればこぶし ひらけば掌

title: Gokudou Naive
synopsis:
This Mafia gangster is so awfully awkward that it's hard not to like him! He's in love with a bento seller. Although he looks tough in business and is notorious for his fighting power, he does not even dare to address him. Can he overcome this inexplicable shyness?

(Source: Egmont Manga, translated)

synopsis: The Okunoin clan makes a living out of erasing peoples' memories.

title: Koumon-sama: Suke-san no Yuuutsu

alternative_titles.ja: 黄門さま～助さんの憂鬱～

synopsis:
Set in the Edo period of Japan, the high-ranking daimyo of the Mito domain cannot keep his bodyguards alive as they travel Japan. To replenish his bodyguards, they institute a recruitment exam aimed towards the poorest of samurais of Japan, "rounin." As a rounin, Shinnosuke Inouse attempts to prove himself to the ranking officials and escape poverty.

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Nambā Kai no Sho: Shin Ero Ninjutsu Kansei!!
synopsis:
This omake is set during the two-and-a-half years that Naruto spends training with Jiraiya between Part I and Part II. After a day of training, Naruto is eager to cook a fish that they caught. Jiraiya, meanwhile, has writer's block for his next Icha Icha novel, and is unwilling to cook Naruto's fish.

(Source: Naruto Wiki)

title: Deokure Tamer no Sono Higurashi

alternative_titles.ja: 出遅れテイマーのその日暮らし

synopsis:
The Law of Justice Online, also known as LJO, is the hottest new VRMMORPG of the season, and office worker Yuta Sasaki is one of the lucky few granted access to the official launch. After some careful research, Yuta is chomping at the bit to start his virtual life as a Tamer, a class that harnesses the powers of wild monsters. Luckily, upon building his character, Yuta manages to land not only his chosen class, but a heap of bonuses to boot! He soon finds, however, that his abilities are not all they're cracked up to be, and that the talents of the rare first monster he is granted lie not in combat...but gardening! Already well behind the other adventurers, and facing a long and slow progression path ahead of him, Yuta is left with two choices—start over from scratch, or make the best of what he has been given. For Yuta the choice is obvious: When life gives you manure...start up a farm!

(Source: J-Novel Club)

title: Yuuwaku no Serenade
synopsis:
Olivia, an interior designer, was introduced to Charles by her friend Ria. Charles is a billionaire who offers to lend money to Olivia so she can fulfill her dream: opening her own design agency. The shop is opened and is very successful. One day Charles suddenly dies. His son-in-law, Edward, is convinced that Olivia was his lover. Charles's lover was actually Ria, but the tabloids spread false information; now everyone is convinced that it was Olivia. Now Olivia has to find Ria, who has disappeared to escape the media, so that Edward knows the truth!

(Source: Harlequin/SB Creative Corp.)

alternative_titles.ja: 代闘士ハイコの事件簿

title: Oda-kun to Hototogi-san

alternative_titles.ja: 織田くんと蛍戸木さん

synopsis: In every class, it’s not usual for there to be one or two people who seem a little strange. In Oda’s class, there is Hototogi. Hototogi doesn’t say much and is always alone. Almost no one seems to know anything about her, which has lead to many strange rumors about her start circulating. It’s not Oda’s responsibility to befriend her, but before he realizes it, he finds himself intrigued by the mysterious Hototogi! (From emanga.com)

title: Suna ni Kieta Itsuwari no Chikai

alternative_titles.ja: 砂に消えた偽りの誓い

synopsis:
She'll trick the world by playing the part of a horrible wife, all for his sake...

Upright and serious secretary Emily is always being confronted with her handsome boss's woman troubles. Not only is Kadir a talented businessman who regularly travels around the world, he's also the prince of a bountiful desert kingdom. And he has a prodigious talent for attracting women. One day, after Kadir receives an emergency message from his home country, he makes an outrageous request: he'll pay Emily a huge sum if she pretends to be his horrible wife! Just what does he have planned?

(Source: Harlequin/SB Creative Corp.)

title: Galaxy Girl, Panda Boy

alternative_titles.ja: 銀河ガールパンダボーイ

synopsis: A collection of three stand-alone stories. "Galaxy Girl, Panda Boy" is the story of Mani, an adolescent girl growing up in an isolated new age community. Mani is convinced that there is something very odd about her family and the other members of the community. She might be right. "The Laidback Person I Will Never Forget" is a short piece in which a young woman named Yukari begins to doubt her relationship with Takafumi, her slacker / surfer boyfriend. She loves him but she's beginning to think that he might be a bit too laid back for his own good and that their relationship might not have much of a future. "Club Hurricane" (split into four sections and comprising by far the largest portion of the volume) is the tale of Andrew and Rose - twins who find themselves sent off to an odd, remote boarding school in the country as a result of their parents' divorce. Once there, the siblings have to deal with isolation, rejection, their eccentric new schoolmates and their reliance on one another. (Source: ANN)

synopsis:
A terrible rumor that the Demon Lord of the North is planning to kidnap princess Alice has spread throughout Wonderland. Enraged by being confused with her brother, Alice, along with Seb, sets out on a journey to the Demon Lord's castle to teach him a lesson. To help her pass all the hurdles along the way, she seeks out the help of her acquaintances, the siblings Hatta and Haigha. Ellie was seventeen when she fell in love with Andrew, a handsome older boy in medical school. Though she was filled with joy when he proposed to her, she began to feel trapped by the thought of a future with him and his single-minded devotion. When Ellie was caught with another man on the day before their wedding, they canceled the wedding in heartbreak. Twelve years later, Ellie is struggling as a single mother and caring for a daughter with a serious heart condition when Andrew enters her life once again—as Hetta's doctor. She has no right to feel regret, no right to think of him and what could have been. She was the one who ran. But why does her heart feel so unsettled?
